display_help: Logging out near a Black Helicopter will earn you a travel speed bonus for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Pilot Day Job badge that will enhance the travel speed bonus granted by logging out here.
display_target_help: Logging out near a Black Helicopter will earn you a travel speed bonus for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Pilot Day Job badge that will enhance the travel speed bonus granted by logging out here.
